channel.title: Scripts on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Scripts on open-archaeo

item.title: 3D-ORGAN
item.description: 3D reconstruction of incomplete archaeological objects using a generative adversarial network (GAN).

item.title: Al2O3_AnalysisApp
item.description: Shiny app to analyse Al2O3:C measurements

item.title: Archaeological_Catalogue_from_CSV_Spreadsheet
item.description: A template to create an archaeological catalogue from a spreadsheet using the LaTeX csvsimple package.

item.title: artefact-morpho.R
item.description: R code for converting B&W jpgs of artefact silhouettes to matrices and computing basic Elliptical Fourier statistics, including PCA and MANOVA.

item.title: Artifact_Class_Diversity
item.description: Estimates artifact class diversity in multiple geographic regions.

item.title: BasicMapping
item.description: Working with map data in R.

item.title: benmarwickDY-XYZ-data-on-an-irregular-grid-to-an-interpolated-raster.r
item.description: Plotting remote sensing data, especially how to go from XYZ data on an irregular grid to an interpolated raster

item.title: benmarwickopencontext.r
item.description: Experimenting with the opencontext.org API using R

item.title: Binomial-Co-occurrence-Assessment
item.description: R script that implements a means for statistically assessing the degree of co-occurrence between classes within a dataset.

item.title: Bootstrap-Correspondence-Analysis
item.description: R-script for conducting and evaluating bootstrapped correspondence analyses.

item.title: Brainerd-Robinson-Similarity-Coefficient-and-Sampling-Error-Assessment
item.description: Script for calculating Brainerd-Robinson coefficients based on tabular count or percent data. This script also estimates the probability that a given difference between two samples is the product of sampling error.

item.title: ca
item.description: R Script for Seriation Using Correspondence Analysis.

item.title: ceramic-computation
item.description: R scripts for digitizing, processing, analyzing, and comparing archaeological ceramic 2d profile drawings, photographs, and other data.

item.title: Ceramic-Frequency-Date-Plot
item.description: This R script produces a exploratory visual for assessing site date ranges originally suggested to me by Wesley Bernardini Redlands University

item.title: CeramicApportioning
item.description: A method for chronological apportioning of ceramic assemblages that considers site occupation dates, ceramic production dates, and popularity distribution curves.

item.title: CloudCal
item.description: This app will allow you to build & apply calibrations for the Tracer & Artax series of XRF devices

item.title: cranial-sex-estimation-code
item.description: Data analysis implementation for evaluating a novel sex estimation method based on skullanalyzer data.

item.title: CSGR
item.description: Extracts and calculates from long bone cross sections, cortical thickness maps, and biomechanically pertinent cross-sectional geometric properties.

item.title: ElementSourcing
item.description: Source archaeological artifacts using elemental composition.

item.title: expotime
item.description: What is the correlation between the exposure time of your photographs and the time of the day?

item.title: findPeaks
item.description: A simple algorithm to find local maxima/minima in sequential data.

item.title: Fix-exif-artist
item.description: Fix the Exif.Image.Artist tag based on user input depending from the camera model. Useful if you have a bunch of photographs from different people all mixed up.

item.title: Ford-Diagram
item.description: This R Function creates a simple Ford diagram for archaeological seriation with error bars determined based on sample size were count data are given

item.title: frontiers-palaeo-additive-modelling
item.description: Modelling and feature detection in palaeoenvironmental time series using additive models.

item.title: Geostat
item.description: Code for Geostatistics in ethnographic contexts.

item.title: Kmeans
item.description: Script for conducting K-means cluster analysis using R. This script provides output designed to help the user select an appropriate cluster solution.

item.title: kriging
item.description: Codes for performing kriging for ethnographic and archaeological data.

item.title: LA_ICP_MS-Routines_FMNH
item.description: Routines to read and analyze LA-ICP-MS data from the Field Museum’s Elemental Analysis Facility

item.title: LISA
item.description: Moran’s I and Getis-Ord G* Analysis.

item.title: lithic3dslicer
item.description: .obj slicing for lithic 3d morphometrics.

item.title: long-bone-diaphyseal-CSG-Toolkit
item.description: A GNU Octave toolkit for analyzing diaphyseal long bone cross sectional geometry.

item.title: Mean-Ceramic-Date-and-Error-Estimation
item.description: Script for calculating mean ceramic dates based on tabular data. This script also estimates sampling error using a bootstrapping procedure.

item.title: missing
item.description: You have a sequence of numbered items and want to check if any are missing.

item.title: munsell-plot.R
item.description: Make a stratigraphic-style plot-schematic of sediment colour using munsell values

item.title: NAA analytical dashboard
item.description: Analytical Dashboard for conducting various analysis to group and assess groupings for Neutron Activation Analytical chemical compositional data

item.title: Near-Presence-Analysis
item.description: R script for analyzing presence/absence data in irregularly distributed archaeological survey units.

item.title: neiman1995
item.description: R Shiny Document - Visualizing model functions in Neimans ‘Stylistic variation in evolutionary perspective’ with an interactive document.

item.title: neolithicR
item.description: Shiny app to search and filter radiocarbon dates from various source databases, based on the R package c14bazAAR.

item.title: non-metric-trait-analysis
item.description: A set of GNU Octave functions for biodistance analysis based on non-metric traits.

item.title: osl_calibration.r
item.description: osl_calibration

item.title: osteometric-sorting
item.description: Tools for osteometric sorting of human remains.

item.title: p2pPerm
item.description: A function for retrieving metrics for resistance-resilience from rcarbon permTest objects.

item.title: PLC
item.description: Pure Locational Clustering.

item.title: PointPattern
item.description: Point Pattern Analysis.

item.title: pollen_data_processing
item.description: some tools in respect to pollen data processing.

item.title: qrcode-storage
item.description: Scripts to create QR-Code images for storage boxes. Each box has an associated web page describing its content, and the QR-Code serves as a short-link from the physical object to the web page.

item.title: QuARI
item.description: A database interface designed to facilitate the irregular, iterative, and non-linear workflows that are commonly employed in lithic analysis.

item.title: radiocarbon-scrapers
item.description: Scrapers for public radiocarbon databases

item.title: rti
item.description: Series of common tols used by most Reflectance Transformation Imaging (RTI) projects, plus some custom programs to help with the workflow from the camera to the output.

item.title: sdsbrowser
item.description: sdsbrowser is an R Shiny WebApp developed to make the available SDS datasets (following the Systematic and Digital Documentation of Stone Artefacts recording system) more accessible. It is designed to give you a quick overview on the spatial and temporal scope of sites previously analysed with SDS and the distribution of artefacts within these sites.

item.title: Sex.DetERRmine
item.description: Calculate the relative coverage of X and Y chromosomes, and their associated error bars, from the depth of coverage at specified SNPs.

item.title: shiny_Tldating
item.description: Shiny app for TL dating

item.title: skeletal-sex-estimation
item.description: A GNU Octave function for skeletal sex estimation.

item.title: skullanalyzer
item.description: A concrete way of extracting cranial mophometric features.

item.title: synthkat
item.description: Synthetic Categories for Archaeological Vessel Comparison.

item.title: Sériation de matrice en présence/absence
item.description: Excel file containing macro commands making it possible to transform a 1/0 table (presence / absence) into a graphic matrix treated by matrix permutations; it is possible to take into account the uncertain presence of a character. The instructions for use are contained in the file.

item.title: tosca
item.description: Tool for Online Seriation and Correspondence Analysis.

item.title: UnconstrainedClustering
item.description: Unconstrained Clustering.
